claimRewards(address).details: Claims rewards from the lending protocol

params.to: The address to receive the rewards

deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposits assets into a lending protocol

params.asset: The address of the asset to deposit

returns._0: The amount of tokens received in return (if any)

getBalance(address).details: Returns the balance of an asset in the lending protocol

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Withdraws assets from a lending protocol

params.asset: The address of the asset to withdraw

returns._0: The amount of tokens actually withdrawn
